servicedefinition.description: Hyper-V Health Summary includes the overall health of the hypervisor and a check of the ratio of virtual processors (VP) to logical processors (LP). Guest Utilization: % of Total Processor time dedicated to running Guests. LP0 % Total RunTime. Root Partition Processor Load. Root Virtual Processor % Hypervisor RunTime

scandetail.description: Number of Partitions in Critical State
Ratio of Virtual to Logical Processors
